document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2009-08
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON ADOPTING AMENDMENTS TO MUNICIPAL CODE CHAPTER 5.04.080 ENTITLED "GROUNDS FOR DENIAL" AND CHAPTER 19.05.010 ENTITLED "PURPOSE" TO PROHIBIT ANY USE THAT IS ILLEGAL IN ACCORDANCE WITH STATE AND/OR FEDERAL LAW
